p: The flowering aerial parts of O. decumbens ( Figure 1) were collected from Choram, Kohgiluyeh va Boyer Ahmad province located in southwest of Iran (30˚78̍ N, 50˚70̍ E, at 740 m altitude above sea level) on 1 June 2014. A specimen of the plant was identified by Prof. F. Attar and deposited in the Central Herbarium of Tehran University (No.451500 TUH).
